local_intent: Lift the grasped lid vertically by 0.1 along the z-axis and confirm retention in the gripper.
assumptions: Lid is already grasped and stable prior to the lift.
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT transfer step: after confirming a stable grasp, perform MoveDelta(z, 0.1, 1200) and verify with ObjectInGripper(lid), consistent with the vertical lift requirement in the overview.
